code: import{Avatar,Button}from'@mui/material';import React,{useState}from'react';import'./TweetBox.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TweetBox(_ref){let{posts,setPosts}=_ref;const[tweetMessage,setTweetMessage]=useState("");const[tweetImage,setTweetImage]=useState("");const sendTweet=e=>{e.preventDefault();const newPost={displayName:"Allsee Technologies",username:"AllseeTech",verified:true,text:tweetMessage,image:tweetImage,avatar:"https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1720020150613651456/KMq5JBTI_400x400.jpg"};setPosts([...posts,newPost]);setTweetMessage("");setTweetImage("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tweetBox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tweetBox__input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{src:"https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1720020150613651456/KMq5JBTI_400x400.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setTweetMessage(e.target.value),value:tweetMessage,placeholder:"What's happening",type:"text"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setTweetImage(e.target.value),value:tweetImage,className:"tweetBox__imageInput",placeholder:"Optional : Enter Image URL",type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:sendTweet,className:"tweetBox__tweetButton",children:"Post"})]})});}export default TweetBox;
